revised_title: Investigation of Galvanic Cells Produced by Light: A Preliminary Communication
tldr: The author investigates the behavior of galvanic cells under the action of light, discovering that they exhibit constant and inconstant cells, reversible and irreversible cells. The study also reveals the complex nature of the phenomena observed, which can be quantitatively separated and analyzed, providing a physico-mathematical basis for understanding these light-induced reactions.
